member.name: T:IFY.Phorm.Execution.AbstractPhormSession
member.summary: Represents a session for executing Phorm contracts and database operations, providing methods for invoking actions, retrieving data, and managing transactions within a scoped database connection.
member.remarks: The session exposes events for monitoring connection lifecycle, command execution, and contract mapping issues. It supports both synchronous and asynchronous operations, as well as transaction management if supported by the underlying runner. Configuration properties allow control over error handling and result size strictness. Use this interface to interact with Phorm contracts and database entities in a scoped and configurable manner.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.Execution.AbstractPhormSession.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Represents a session for executing Phorm contracts and database operations, providing methods for invoking actions, retrieving data, and managing transactions within a scoped database connection.
member.remarks: The session exposes events for monitoring connection lifecycle, command execution, and contract mapping issues. It supports both synchronous and asynchronous operations, as well as transaction management if supported by the underlying runner. Configuration properties allow control over error handling and result size strictness. Use this interface to interact with Phorm contracts and database entities in a scoped and configurable manner.

member.name: T:IFY.Phorm.Execution.IPhormContractRunner
member.summary: Defines methods for retrieving and filtering entity instances from a contract-based data source.
member.remarks: Implementations of this interface allow querying for single or multiple entities, with support for synchronous and asynchronous operations. Filtering can be applied prior to entity parsing using predicates, enabling efficient resultset narrowing. The interface is typically used to construct queries that are executed via the Get or GetAsync methods. Thread safety and execution context depend on the specific implementation.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.Execution.IPhormContractRunner.GetAsync``1
member.summary: Get one or more entity instances.
member.typeparam: The type of entity to map result data to.
member.returns: When is the entity type, will return the single result instance or null. When is an array of the entity type, will return an array of all types from the result (never null).

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.Execution.IPhormContractRunner.GetAsync``1(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get one or more entity instances.
member.typeparam: The type of entity to map result data to.
member.param: A token to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.returns: When is the entity type, will return the single result instance or null. When is an array of the entity type, will return an array of all types from the result (never null).

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.Execution.IPhormContractRunner.Where``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Adds a predicate to filter the resultset before the entire entity is parsed.
member.typeparam: The entity type that will be fetched in the subsequent Get call.

member.summary: Adds a predicate to filter the resultset before the entire entity is parsed as a gen-spec.
member.typeparam: The base entity type that will be used to filter results.

A wrapper for an instance, adding standard transaction-handling logic.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.Extensions.GetExpressionParameterProperties(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression,System.Type)
member.summary: Return array of all properties referenced in an expression for the parameter of given type.

member.name: T:IFY.Phorm.GlobalSettings
member.summary: Provides global configuration settings for encryption, error handling, JSON serialization, and database object naming conventions used throughout the application.
member.remarks: This class contains static properties that control application-wide behaviors, such as the encryption provider for secure value handling, error reporting preferences, JSON serialization settings, and default prefixes for stored procedures, tables, and views. Changes to these settings affect all components that reference them. Thread safety is not guaranteed; ensure appropriate synchronization if settings are modified at runtime.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.GlobalSettings.EncryptionProvider
member.summary: The registered instance of the to use for secure value handling.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.GlobalSettings.ExceptionsAsConsoleMessage
member.summary: If true, will consume execution errors and treat like a console message. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.GlobalSettings.NewtonsoftJsonSerializerSettings
member.summary: The global to use when dealing with JSON. If null, uses library defaults.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.GlobalSettings.StrictResultSize
member.summary: Whether to throw a if an invocation result includes more records than expected. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.GlobalSettings.ProcedurePrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the prefix used for accessing stored procedures in the database.
member.remarks: The default value is "usp_". This property can be set to customize the naming convention for stored procedures in database operations.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.GlobalSettings.TablePrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the prefix to use for accessing database tables.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.GlobalSettings.ViewPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the prefix used for identifying database views.
member.remarks: The default value is "vw_". This property can be set to customize the naming convention for views in database operations.

member.name: T:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession
member.summary: Represents a session for executing Phorm contracts and database operations, providing methods for invoking actions, retrieving data, and managing transactions within a scoped database connection.
member.remarks: The session exposes events for monitoring connection lifecycle, command execution, and contract mapping issues. It supports both synchronous and asynchronous operations, as well as transaction management if supported by the underlying runner. Configuration properties allow control over error handling and result size strictness. Use this interface to interact with Phorm contracts and database entities in a scoped and configurable manner.

member.name: E:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.Connected
member.summary: The event invoked when a new database connection is created.

member.name: E:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.CommandExecuting
member.summary: The event invoked when a command is about to be executed.

member.name: E:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.CommandExecuted
member.summary: The event invoked when a command has finished executing.

member.name: E:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.UnexpectedRecordColumn
member.summary: A result record contained a column not specified in the target entity type.

member.name: E:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.UnresolvedContractMember
member.summary: A result record did not contain a column specified in the target entity type.

member.name: E:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.ConsoleMessage
member.summary: A log message was received during execution.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.ConnectionName
member.summary: The connection name this session uses for database scoping.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.ExceptionsAsConsoleMessage
member.summary: If true, will consume execution errors and treat like a console message. Defaults to value in .

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.StrictResultSize
member.summary: Whether to throw a if an invocation result includes more records than expected. Defaults to value in .

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.SetConnectionName(System.String)
member.summary: Get a new instance of this session scoped with a different connection name.
member.param: The connection name to use when scoping the new session instance.
member.returns: A new instance of this session with a different connection name.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.CallAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Invokes the specified contract asynchronously and returns the result as an integer.
member.param: The name of the contract to invoke. Cannot be null or empty.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the integer value returned by the contract.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.CallAsync(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Invokes an asynchronous call to the specified contract with the provided arguments.
member.param: The name of the contract to invoke. Cannot be null or empty.
An object containing the arguments to pass to the contract. May be null if the contract does not require arguments.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the integer value returned by the contract call.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.CallAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Invokes the specified contract asynchronously and returns the result as an integer.
member.param: The name of the contract to invoke. Cannot be null or empty.
A token that can be used to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the integer value returned by the contract.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.CallAsync(System.String,System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Invokes an asynchronous call to the specified contract and returns the result as an integer.
member.param: The name of the contract to invoke. Cannot be null or empty.
An optional argument object to pass to the contract. May be null if the contract does not require arguments.
A cancellation token that can be used to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the integer value returned by the contract.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.CallAsync``1
member.summary: Invokes the specified action contract asynchronously without any arguments and returns the result code.
member.typeparam: The type of the action contract to invoke. Must implement .
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the integer result code returned by the action contract.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.CallAsync``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Invokes the specified action contract asynchronously using the provided arguments.
member.typeparam: The type of the action contract to invoke. Must implement .
member.param: An object containing the arguments to pass to the action contract. May be if the contract does not require arguments.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the status code returned by the action contract.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.CallAsync``1(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Invokes the specified action contract asynchronously without arguments and returns the result code.
member.typeparam: The type of the action contract to invoke. Must implement .
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the result code returned by the action contract.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.CallAsync``1(``0)
member.summary: Invokes the specified action contract asynchronously and returns the result code.
member.typeparam: The type of the action contract to execute. Must implement .
member.param: The action contract instance containing the parameters for the call. Cannot be null.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the integer code returned by the action.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.CallAsync``1(``0,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Invokes the specified action contract asynchronously and returns the result code.
member.typeparam: The type of the action contract to execute. Must implement .
member.param: The action contract instance to invoke. Cannot be null.
A cancellation token that can be used to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the integer result code returned by the action contract.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.CallAsync``1(System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Invokes an asynchronous call to the specified action contract with the provided arguments.
member.typeparam: The type of the action contract to invoke. Must implement .
member.param: An object containing the arguments to pass to the action contract. Can be if the action does not require arguments.
A cancellation token that can be used to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains an integer status code returned by the action contract.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.From(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a contract runner for the specified contract name.
member.param: The name of the contract to instantiate. Cannot be null or empty.
member.returns: An instance of for the specified contract name.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.From(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a contract runner instance for the specified contract name and optional arguments.
member.param: The name of the contract to instantiate. Cannot be null or empty.
An optional object containing initialization arguments for the contract. May be null if the contract does not require arguments.
member.returns: An instance configured for the specified contract and arguments.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.From``1
member.summary: Creates a contract runner for the specified action contract type.
member.typeparam: The type of action contract to execute. Must implement .
member.returns: An instance for executing the specified contract type.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.From``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a contract runner for the specified action contract type, optionally initializing it with the provided arguments.
member.typeparam: The type of action contract to be executed. Must implement .
member.param: An optional object containing initialization arguments for the contract. May be if no arguments are required.
member.returns: An instance configured for the specified contract type.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.From``1(``0)
member.summary: Creates a contract runner for the specified action contract instance.
member.typeparam: The type of the action contract to be executed. Must implement .
member.param: The action contract instance to be used for execution. Cannot be null.
member.returns: An that can execute the specified contract.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.GetAsync``1
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves a result of the specified reference type, or null if no result is available.
member.typeparam: The type of the result to retrieve. Must be a reference type.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the retrieved object of type , or null if no result is found.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.GetAsync``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves a result of the specified type using the provided arguments.
member.typeparam: The type of the result to retrieve. Must be a reference type.
member.param: An object containing the arguments required to perform the retrieval. Can be null if no arguments are needed.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the retrieved object of type if found; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.GetAsync``1(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves a result of the specified reference type, supporting cancellation.
member.typeparam: The type of the result to retrieve. Must be a reference type.
member.param: A token that can be used to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the retrieved value of type , or if no result is available.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.GetAsync``1(``0)
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves a result based on the specified contract object.
member.typeparam: The type of the contract object and the result to retrieve. Must be a reference type.
member.param: The contract object that specifies the parameters for the retrieval operation. Cannot be null.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the retrieved object of type TResult, or null if no result is found.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.GetAsync``1(``0,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves a result of the specified contract type.
member.typeparam: The type of the contract to retrieve. Must be a reference type.
member.param: An instance of the contract type that specifies the retrieval criteria. Cannot be null.
A token that can be used to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the retrieved contract instance, or null if no matching result is found.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.GetAsync``1(System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves a result of the specified reference type using the provided arguments.
member.typeparam: The type of the result to retrieve. Must be a reference type.
member.param: An object containing the arguments required to perform the retrieval. May be null if no arguments are needed.
A token that can be used to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the retrieved object of type TResult, or null if no result is found.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.SupportsTransactions
member.summary: True if this runner implementation supports transactions.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.IsInTransaction
member.summary: True if this runner is currently in a transaction.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.IPhormSession.BeginTransaction
member.summary: Begin a new transaction, with associated runner.
member.returns: The runner of the transaction.

member.name: T:IFY.Phorm.PhormContractAttribute
member.summary: Specifies metadata for a database contract, indicating the target object type, contract name, and schema for the decorated class or interface.
member.remarks: Apply this attribute to a class or interface to define how it maps to a database object, such as a stored procedure or table. The attribute allows customization of the contract's name and schema, which can be useful when the database naming differs from the code. Only one instance of this attribute can be applied to a type.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.PhormContractAttribute.Target
member.summary: The type of database object the contract targets. Note that only supports receiving data via Call.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.PhormContractAttribute.Name
member.summary: The contract name to use, if not the same as the decorated class / interface.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.PhormContractAttribute.Namespace
member.summary: The database schema to use for this contract, if not the default schema of the connection.

member.name: T:IFY.Phorm.Transformation.AbstractTransphormAttribute
member.summary: Base structure for an attribute that can transform data between a contract property type and a databasource.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.Transformation.AbstractTransphormAttribute.FromDatasource(System.Type,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Transform source data to the required contract property type.
member.param: The property type of the target property on the contract.
The raw data from the datasource.
The context of the transformation.
member.returns: The data to be put in the contract property.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.Transformation.AbstractTransphormAttribute.ToDatasource(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Transform contract data to the type expected by the datasource.
member.param: The current value in the contract.
The context of the transformation.
member.returns: The data to be sent to the datasource.

member.name: T:IFY.Phorm.Transformation.EnumValueAttribute
member.summary: Transform the contract property enum value to/from the same integer or string representation. Both the integer and string representations are always supported for receiving, but sending must specify.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.Transformation.EnumValueAttribute.SendAsString
member.summary:
Whether to send the string representation of this enum, or the integer. Defaults to false.
Note: will honour decoration on the enum values, if exist.

member.name: T:IFY.Phorm.Transformation.JsonValueAttribute
member.summary: Transform the contract property object to JSON, or the datasource value from JSON.
